name: NServiceKit
tagline: Forever free, open source web services framework for .NET
body:
### NServiceKit is a forever free, open source fork of ServiceStack V3.  
The goal of this fork is to provide a high quality, well-tested, concise framework for building web services for .NET.  We have a special focus on web services on the server side (both Microsoft and Mono) and will strive to be the best framework that works well with others.

## Near Term Project Goals
### Add and enhance community requested features
* Add features that the community wanted in ServiceStack V3
* Enhance limited features/functionality
* Work better with other projects

### Clean up code
* Remove deprecated obsolete features and general cruft
* Remove unnecessary platform targets
* Document
* Unit Test

### Support Mono
* Build on Travis with Unit Tests
* Take requests for fixes on Mono

## Build Status
### Microsoft
NServiceKit: [![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/3mnpwkirfki9mggf)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mirthy/nservicekit)  
NServiceKit.Text: [![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/gm29nh7lvrfa6clg)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mirthy/nservicekit-text)  
NServiceKit.Redis: [![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/c9anu1egmwyg38md)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mirthy/nservicekit-redis)  
### Mono
NServiceKit: [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/NServiceKit/NServiceKit.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/NServiceKit/NServiceKit)  
NServiceKit.Text: Coming soon  
NServiceKit.Redis: Coming soon  
### Please create [issues](https://github.com/NServiceKit/NServiceKit/issues) for us if you have a feature/bug fix/enhancement. We welcome all pull requests as well!
